title: Emerging Voices Scholarship
description: $2,500 award supporting neurodivergent creators pursuing communications or design programs.

title: South Florida Inclusive Internship
description: Paid summer internship pairing autistic students with local civic tech teams.

title: Healthcare Pathfinder Apprenticeship
description: Entry-level hospital operations role with built-in coaching and certification stipends.

title: Palm Beach Technology Scholarship
description: Funding for coding bootcamps or assistive tech certifications.
